value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Gather around, everyone. I'm afraid
I have terrible news.$k$pThe Emblian Empire is mounting
another attack on our kingdom.$k$p$EFace_Anger|They have more Heroes in their
ranks. Some are from the World
of Mystery.$k$pOther Heroes are from the World
of Binding and the World of
Blazing.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|What? Mystery, Binding, and
Blazing? But our order liberated
all of those worlds from them!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Those blasted Emblians must have
snuck back into those worlds and
taken them over again!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Their Heroes are headed for our
capital. We need to stop them
before they conquer Askr!$k

$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Ah, have the pesky flies finally
arrived? Veronica said that
you'd try to get in my way.$k$pHmpf. I thought I'd be facing
opponents who were at least
slightly worthy of my time.$k$pWell, know that you stand before
Michalis, King of Macedon.
Do try to entertain me.$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You defeated me? Impossible!$k$pYet I have to admit that the
Heroes in your group have proven
themselves worthy today.$k$pSo, you may proceed. Still, should
our paths cross again, don't expect
me to forget this disgrace.$k$Sbs150|
